meanings.definition: A sticky substance used for attaching a ski to the bottom of a ski.
meanings.sent1: I applied klister to my ski to make it stick better.
meanings.sent2: The klister helped keep the ski in place on the slope.
meanings.sent3: The klister was so sticky, it caught a few leaves on the way down.
meanings.sent4: The klister acted like a magnet, pulling the ski firmly onto the snow.
meanings.sent5: The klister clung to the ski like glue, ensuring a secure grip.

meanings.definition: To apply klister to a ski for better grip on icy surfaces.
meanings.sent1: I need to klister my ski before heading out on the icy trail.
meanings.sent2: She klistered her skis carefully to avoid slipping on the frozen slope.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally klistered his gloves instead of the ski, making a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: Klistering the ski felt like adding a super grip booster for the icy conditions.
meanings.sent5: The skier quickly klistered the ski, ready to conquer the frozen terrain.
